verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Salvation belongs to our God Who sits upon the throne And unto the Lamb Praise and glory, wisdom and thanks Honor and power and strength.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And we the redeemed shall be strong In purpose and unity, we carry the love Praise and glory, wisdom and thanks Honor and power and strength.{/lang-eng}
